com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.widget

Interface DataBound

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataBoundArrayAdapter

    public interface DataBound

    Exposes methods for binding data from a datastore.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 01/14/13
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind()
      Binds the data source data to the widget.
      EventPublisher getEventPublisher()
      Returns the EventPublisher associated with this DataBound .
      void updateForEvent(DataEvent dataEvent)
      Updates the DataBound structure according to the given DataEvent, which could be the creation, modification, or deletion of an entity.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        void bind()
        Binds the data source data to the widget. This will result in some sort of datastore query.

      • updateForEvent

        void updateForEvent(DataEvent dataEvent)
        Updates the DataBound structure according to the given DataEvent, which could be the creation, modification, or deletion of an entity.
        Parameters:
        dataEvent - the DataEvent to respond to

      • getEventPublisher

        EventPublisher getEventPublisher()
        Returns the EventPublisher associated with this DataBound .
        Returns:
        EventPublisher
